com.jayway.android.robotium.remotecontrol.solo

Class Timeout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.android.robotium.remotecontrol.solo.Timeout

  • public class Timeout
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to process the methods of Timeout at the robotium-remote-control side.
    This is only a wrapper class, the real implementation is in Solo class, refer to Solo

    Usage:
    Timeout timeout = new Timeout(solo);

    Since:
    Jun 18, 2013

    • Method Detail

      • setLargeTimeout

        public boolean setLargeTimeout(int milliseconds)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException,
                               RemoteException,
                               java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                               ShutdownInvocationException
        Sets the default timeout length of the waitFor methods. Its by default set to 20 000 milliseconds. -- Robotium 4.1+ required.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds, - int, the timeout of the waitFor methods, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        true if the command executed successfully, false if it did not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
        RemoteException
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        ShutdownInvocationException

      • setSmallTimeout

        public boolean setSmallTimeout(int milliseconds)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException,
                               RemoteException,
                               java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                               ShutdownInvocationException
        Sets the default timeout length of the get, is, set, assert, enter and click methods. Its by default set to 10 000 milliseconds. -- Robotium 4.1+ required.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds, - int, the timeout of the get, is, set, assert, enter and click methods, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        true if the command executed successfully, false if it did not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
        RemoteException
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        ShutdownInvocationException
